Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can illustrate a problem where people need to communicate over a long distance.
The student can draw the string telephone as a device that sends and receives sound.
The student can depict the necessary parts of the string telephone, such as the cups and string.
The student can show that the device can work over a given distance between two students.
The student can include labels or notes explaining how the device uses sound to communicate.
The student can draw the string telephone using only the specified materials (cups, string).
The student can highlight how this communication device helps people connect over long distances.
